channel.title: Thailand on Andreas Beger
channel.description: Recent content in Thailand on Andreas Beger

item.title: The Thailand coup and some recent forecasting work
item.description: I blogged earlier at Predictive Heuristics about the Thailand coup and some forecasting work I’ve recently been part of: This morning (East Coast time), the Thai military staged a coup against the caretaker government that had been in power for the past several weeks, after months of protests and political turmoil directed at the government of Yingluck Shinawatra, who herself had been ordered to resign on 7 May by the judiciary.
